content: I'm impressed by the amount of research that went into these books. I've always been interested in historical fiction because it helps me learn about history in a more engaging way. Speaking of which, I've been involved in a few online groups related to books and history, like the "Book Lovers" group on Facebook where I posted a review of "The Nightingale" and got 12 likes. Do you have any recommendations for other online communities or resources that might be useful for someone interested in historical fiction and history?
